name: @pproenca/node-webcodecs
description: Server-side WebCodecs implementation for Node.js backed by FFmpeg

scripts.build: npm run build:native && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: tsc && mkdir -p dist/types && cp types/webcodecs.d.ts dist/types/
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:native && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:native: cd test/cpp && cmake -B build && cmake --build build && ./build/webcodecs_tests
scripts.test:native:tsan: cd test/cpp && cmake -B build -DENABLE_TSAN=ON && cmake --build build && ./build/webcodecs_tests
scripts.test:native:asan: cd test/cpp && cmake -B build -DENABLE_ASAN=ON && cmake --build build && ./build/webcodecs_tests
scripts.test:native:ubsan: cd test/cpp && cmake -B build -DENABLE_UBSAN=ON && cmake --build build && ./build/webcodecs_tests
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:cpp
scripts.format: npm run format:ts && npm run format:cpp
scripts.format:cpp: find src test/cpp -path test/cpp/build -prune -o \( -name '*.cpp' -o -name '*.h' \) -print | xargs clang-format -i
